website_summaries.verdict: The best budget college backpack for budget-conscious students wanting good storage.
pros: Efficient design uses a single primary storage compartment that can fit up to a 15.6" laptop
Outer skin material is resistant to rain and splashes of water
cons: Backpack lacks major padding between the laptop or ground, potentially causing damage when setting the backpack down

customer_reviews.title: smaller than average, so be wary
customer_reviews.text: smaller than average but it works for me (5'0" female in college). holds what i need for art but probably wouldnt work for more than one textbook. fits my 15" macbook perfectly. strong straps and roomy pockets for a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice and sturdy backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice and sturdy backpack. It has all the little pockets that I could ever need. It also looks like it will last me a while because the material its made of seems to be of a good quality. It's unisex and perfect for college students. My laptop and books fit snugly.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: BACKPACK IS BEAUTIFUL AS PICTURE ONLINE but
customer_reviews.text: BACKPACK IS BEAUTIFUL AS PICTURE ONLINE but... I can only give it four stars because it is a lot smaller than an average backpack. It isn't tiny like those designer ladies backpacks but it isn't as large as a Jansport either. I purchased this item for my child, who is starting junior high school in the fall. With all the books children bring home for homework in middle school I am also concerned with how tough the bag is and can it withstand heavy books (if more than three can fit in it). I would suggest posting bag size and dimensions along with comparisons in size to other back packs.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel/everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect for flights. It fits under the seat perfectly with room to spare. The charging port is a nice touch. It does require a separate charging pack, if that is unclear. But the cord within the backpack is long enough to reach charging packs of all sizes. The straps are wide enough to provide shoulder support. The inner pockets come in handy. My only wish is that the side pockets were a little bit deeper, to securely hold water bottles or umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best back pack I HAVE EVER BOUGHT
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is built sturdy. Although at this time I am carrying two large books for my certification I will definitely be using it to tote around my laptop when I go out of town. Inside the divider is sturdy and snug fitting so things don’t hapharzardly fly around in the bag... it’s turkey the best back pack I have ever purchased and with 5 kids and a college grad I have bought my fair share of bags!
customer_reviews.author: SMD

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack for college students
customer_reviews.text: It's very good and light weight. It has a portable charger section which I find very convenient. I love the color and it has just enough compartments and a laptop compartments as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rose B.

customer_reviews.title: Update: Customer service is great. This lasted like 2. 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This lasted like 2.5 months. Its embarrassingly worn out now. Holes and ripping everywhere. Id rather invest in a quality backpack. Update: Their customer service is great. They gave me a free new backpack to replace my torn one.
customer_reviews.author: tl

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack for the price
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is amazing for the price. It stands up against water pretty well and overall the quality of the material is great. The bag fits my 15.6 inch laptop perfectly and the charging port on the side is extremely convenient to charge you phone during class without being near an outlet. The cable inside is long enough to connect your laptop or battery pack to charge your phone. Overall it has enough space for an average college or highschool student so I think this bag is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I love, really love this back pack but it's quite ...
customer_reviews.text: I love, really love this back pack but it's quite small. Cannot hold my folder in addition to my laptop, n text book. Still contemplating whether to keep it. Or return it and get something bigger so am not holding a lot of things.
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for school or traveling
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! I can fit all my class supplies for the day. On the small side but I like that quality. Good amount of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Yunk

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say. We are sending it back. Thought there was a battery port to charge. Same as plugging phone in the wall. My son wanted the backpack so he could add to his phone charge without having to plug it in. What’s the point or are we missing something?
customer_reviews.author: Sean C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to carry, functional, and great look
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Bought for my daughter, freshman in college, and she loves it. The style is great and so is functionality. Lots of room inside for everything she needs to carry (books, laptop, notebooks, snacks) without a big, bulky bag feel. She was having issues with last backpack hurting her shoulders-- but not this one. Weight in bag is evenly distributed and she said it feels much better. Can't beat the price and 2 day shipping either!
customer_reviews.author: April Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Alright bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits just enough to fit a 15" laptop, folder, notebook, pencil case and charger. However, the zipper function is a bit hard to open and close. It may be due to the way the book bag is sewn. The overlap on the zipper is too close in my opinion. A little bit more room to easily access the zipper would make the bag better. On rainy days, the bag wasn't completely soaked and the inside stayed dry, but the bag isn't completely water resistant and needs to be aired out.
customer_reviews.author: B. Huang

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long :0(
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this backpack a 5 star review until the plastic piece that holds the strap broke a couple of days ago. I don't even how it broke, because I don't carry heavy items in it. I'm very unhappy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff Onia

customer_reviews.title: Charging port updates
customer_reviews.text: My son (11) loved this backpack overall but he mainly wanted this because of the charging of phone. Unfortunately after one day, the charging port was not working to charge the phone even after we charged the port. So sad Update 7/23/19: the company reached out to me and provided me with a replacement and my son loves it. It works with the portable charger brand Anker and he’s a happy kid. So thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa J

customer_reviews.title: Read
customer_reviews.text: It's too small of a backpack DONT BUY IF NEED A SCHOOL BACKPACK
customer_reviews.author: barth

customer_reviews.title: The bag broke before I could even use it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for college and have had it sitting in my room for a few months until I leave. I went to put a few items in it to store them, and when I went to zip up the bag, the zipper would not zip up correctly, revealing it was broken. I don't understand why the bag has such good ratings based on my experience. The bag is also much smaller than one would expect and isn't necessarily practical for school use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for walking around
customer_reviews.text: If you go to the zoo, or go to a museum or something, this backpack is the perfect size. Comfortably holds enough stuff to last throughout a long day of walking without being too heavy on the shoulders. Love the laptop/tablet separator sleeve in the main compartment. Couldn't figure out the charger thing, the bag doesn't come with instructions. I wouldn't use it anyway so I haven't messed with it. If you're out and about and it starts raining, you'll be fine with this backpack. It does make my back sweat but I sweat fairly easily. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and love all the pockets and details.  Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack for the price out there that has all these features! I use it to transport my laptop as I freelance. I also use it with my youngest who is still in diapers. We live in Florida so we need a water bottle year-round. As a busy, working mom its nice to have my hands free. My portable charger fits great and keeps me going all day from work to mom-duty! I was also looking for something that didn't look ugly - I didn't need a Kate Spade backpack but at least descent looking. I think this backpack looks nice and isn't too bulky- about as small is it can be and still fit a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but it is small
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It has been very cute, useful, and has endured well. That said, I only used it for one semester at college and only used it twice a week. My biggest complaint is that the inside is very small. I could not use it very easily with my macbook pro. I couldn't put it in the laptop pouch as intended. This wasn't too big of a deal for me since I carried very little with me, and just put my papers and notebooks in the laptop section, and my laptop in the main section.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: I thought these backpacks were excellent value for the money. The fabric is thick and seemingly water resistant. The construction seems very solid and the zippers pull nicely. I’ve ordered 100 backpacks for a back to school donation drive and these are much better quality than any of the Walmart options at this price point. One thing that could be of concern is if you have many many text books to lug around. However, this backpack very easily fits a binder, several notebooks, folders, a pencil case with a lot of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: TTL

customer_reviews.title: Simple design yet very useful
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backpack that was simple with a compartment for my 15 inch laptop and this one does the job plus more. It comes with 2 main compartments; 1 small one in the front for your everyday items, like pens, change, and keys, that you'd need access to quickly or easily and 1 large one for the larger items, like your laptop and books. The large compartment also has a upper small zipper pocket for even storage. What really locked me in on this backpack, besides the price, was that it came with a side us port so you can charge your phone easily and conveniently. Overall I really love this backpack because of its simplicity, quality, and size.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my daughter in high school. It wasn’t as roomie as she had hoped but it would do. After 2 weeks of school the top nylon loop can frayed and almost broke. She never hung it from this loop, only minimal use. Of course, by the time we ordered another backpack from another website, the one month window to return it was closed, I am very disappointed and dissatisfied with this backpack. I would recommend spending a bit more for a more quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R

customer_reviews.title: This is not a regular "book bag"
customer_reviews.text: Bag is made of pretty good quality and is soft without being too flimsy. Almost perfect buy for anyone, however........Beware...if your child is going to be required to carry around several textbooks, this may not work out. The bag is not firm enough, nor wide enough for that kind of wear and weight. Again, great product, but not built to carry 3-4 textbooks from end to end over a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable At All
customer_reviews.text: Literally only had this for 3 months, one and a half months without use, and both straps are entirely broken. Not worth it or durable enough for even light use. I barely had a laptop and notebook in it and now it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Makenna Dutter

customer_reviews.title: Many flaws
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the product for many reasons. The color is not exactly the same as they have shown in the pictures. The fabric is not good, very stiff. Side pockets are not deep, can’t fit a coffee mug or a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, Broke after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this backpack at first. While the side packets were not large enough for a water bottle, I used them for my keys and phone which was really convenient. However, all of the zippers have came off, and one of the straps completely broke. Being in college, I really wanted a reliable backpack that I could use the whole year without having to worry about getting a new one in the middle of the semester. I really wish it was made with more quality materials because I do enjoy the design so much, but now I am just left disappointed and with a sore shoulder because I only have one working strap.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured, the quality looks and feels amazing. Did not have a weird smell when opening the package, no loose strings or seems coming apart. Feels durable, I packed it with my MacBook laptop fits perfect in the back pocket. I also put my textbook and two notebooks as well as my pens and pencils and it doesn’t feel so heavy when you carry it. Love it so far will update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: ivonne

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack choice
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack for my high school daughter for this school year. She loves it. It looks very fashionable where others tend to look clunky. It has plenty of room and works well. She has only used it for a few days, so I cannot attest to long term durability, but it looks well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Yonkers

customer_reviews.title: Five-star Pending Heat Transfer
customer_reviews.text: I have received the backpack and I love the look of it! We are using these for a kids giveaway prize at our church. The thing is that we like to use heat transfers to put our logo on the bag which limits us to cloth/canvas bags like this. I'm optimistic but I haven't done the transfer yet. So I'm satisfied thus far, but the fifth star is pending on how well it responds to heat transfer. Will update. Edit: it took the transfers perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this backpack. I got it for a day trip to Canada and it is perfect. It is the perfect size and has a lot of pockets. The texture of the pack pack itself if high quality and soft, doesn’t sound or look like paper. The charging port is in the oerfect place and there are two places to put water bottles, which is great for maintaining space. Overall, it’s a steal for the price and well worth the money. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie b

customer_reviews.title: The backpack has a space for your laptop that is nice but worrisome if you drop the backback with your ...
customer_reviews.text: The backpack has enough room for a regular college student that takes their books and notebooks for only class days to school, but will bet a tight fit if you are a person thats puts all your books and notebooks for all your classes kept in the backpack.The backpack has a space for your laptop that is nice but worrisome if you drop the backback with your laptop in it, since their is not much padding for protection. The zipper needs a bit of work since it occasionally gets stuck. Wish they could have made the straps a bit longer. Overall its a decent backpack for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Moran

customer_reviews.title: A durable and cheaper alternative
customer_reviews.text: The bag feels sturdy and rugged with just enough compartments to make it more than useful. Wasn't looking for an overnighter, just something to carry essentials back and forth to work. Only drawback and, probably with most packs this size, it won't sit on the floor without falling over. This can annoying.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ailes

customer_reviews.title: Useful until it broke
customer_reviews.text: This was a great smaller backpack for my 2 hour commute each day, however it couldn't stand up to this daily use and one of the plastic buckles broke less than a year later. Taking into account it's price though and how often I was using it, I wasn't entirely surprised. It served its purpose but I think I will be investing a bag that will last longer this time.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa H

customer_reviews.title: Ok bag but...
customer_reviews.text: The backpack looks good the USB port is functional... But that is the end of the good part The bag itself is small very small... You could get a laptop and 1 large textbook maybe 2 not very much room in the main pocket just beware of that if you buy this for school. We purchased it for a day bag to go on a trip it should work for that just fine.
customer_reviews.author: macdee

customer_reviews.title: Backpack ripped after a month
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this backpack initially. I use it as my bag for work, and can fit my wallet, lunch, large water bottle and many other small items comfortably in this backpack. The laptop pocket fits my laptop perfectly. However, after just a month of use the backpack ripped inside near the zipper. I'm going to keep using the backpack because I still like the backpack, its just disappointing that it ripped after such a little amount of use.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Back wore out after ~6 months of normal use
customer_reviews.text: I used this daily since I got it in August. A few days ago it the back started showing some wear and by today there are two large worn out patches, one of which even shows the mesh underneath. I'm used to buying backpacks at a rate of about once every 14-18 months, this one didn't last half that long. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed having the phone charging capabilities and still being discrete ...
customer_reviews.text: The backpack has many features and still has a sleek look. I enjoyed having the phone charging capabilities and still being discrete with it. It has plenty of room and allows for many things to be transported. It is a comfortable and light weight backpack. I would recommend it to anyone who wants a nice backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Handy Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 13 months ago and it gave out on me yesterday. The buckle and strap on one side snapped while I was walking a mile to catch a train. This bag served me well as a work commute bag. I work in Chicago so we get rain, this bag as never gotten soaked. As I sit here looking for a replacement, this is definitely a contender.
customer_reviews.author: Jean S.

customer_reviews.title: Small inner compartment bad pencil holders
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack for 20$. The only issue i have with it is the pen/pencil holders that are sewn into the inside have no bottoms, so if you slide a pencil in it just drops into the bottom of the bag, and with all the pockets inside it makes the inner bag kinda small. Other than that is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Smokalangelo

customer_reviews.title: Not huge, but looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice backpack, lots of cool pockets inside, fairly sturdy. My son really likes it and is using it for school, but for a high school kid with lots of books and folders, it might be a bit too small. He’s stuffing every square inch of it because he likes it, but it’s a tight fit. If he has to get a bigger one at some point, he will still use this one for other purposes because he thinks it’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag! Quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for the laptop pocket. It did not disappoint. The bag is sturdy and well-made. It holds my laptop and files perfectly. The straps are comfortable and easily adjustable. The USB port is very useful. I stick my battery charger in one of the inside pockets and it works perfectly. I highly recommend this bag - it's a great buy at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Leslie A. Arter

customer_reviews.title: It a good backpack for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pro 1. Appear as it is advertised 2. The material can put up a fight against water (but not prolong exposure to rain/water) 3. Fits about 2 textbook + 2 notebook and a laptop (realistically) Meh 1. The pocket behind the laptop compartment is questionable. You cannot put anything in it beside paper/wires/etc that doesn't put pressure on the laptop or get crushed by the laptop Con 1. The arm straps are kind of small, it doesn't fit well with a coat on. It should fit alright without a coat on but still on the tight side. 2. The arm strap may come apart if you tugged on it too much (almost dropped my laptop inside my backpack).
customer_reviews.author: Duy Thanh Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This was for my daughter. She is in middle school and asked for a backpack that was black. I searched in all the stores I could think of and they were either out of my price range or not black. I found this one on amazon and she actually said she liked it. We received it on time and my daughter was thrilled. She likes all the pockets and likes the gray and black color concept. So glad I was finally able to find something she really likes. Thank you for this product. Sincerely the mother of a picky teenager 😁
customer_reviews.author: Dalia

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for an 8th grade student who wanted a simple solid color girls back pack. I like the sturdiness of the back. there is a pencil pocket in the front, 2 small side pockets for water-bottle and items other storage and inside there is a faded pocket for laptop and another zipper small pocket which we currently use to store laptop charger. Overall, both my daughter and myself are satisfied with it. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Zelalem M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for high schooler
customer_reviews.text: I researched backpacks for durability and storage. My daughter also wanted something that looked nice (she chose the light teal). Despite the color, it's holding up well in terms of not looking dirty. It has plenty of room, and she has travelled with it multiple times. I'm really happy with this and would recommend it strongly.
customer_reviews.author: NWMoominmamma

customer_reviews.title: Quality material, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This bag is lightweight and made of quality materials. I used it every day for my back and forth 5-hour commute to the city in rain or shine and it is still like new. I wish it had a little thicker padding at the bottom though - it may not be enough to protect laptop if the bag is dropped on a hard floor at a particular angle. Hence 4 stars overall and storage category.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad A Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I started graduate school and needed a simple back pack to go to and from class. This one is great and has a enough space to hold my things. I only take two classes at a time, so I have my folders and books for those two classes plus my laptop. I don’t think it would be spacious for much more than that. But it’s durable and I love that the laptop has it’s own little area.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical for daily commuter
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for the daily commuter. I have not tested it as being waterproof, but the material seems solid. I love the size and pockets and storage. The material and zippers are solid. It feels like it will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ampick22

customer_reviews.title: Durable, sturdy and perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room,excellent padding and I just love the option of having a plug for my phone. You need to provide the power cube to supply the charge but there is an USB extender that can be plugged in on the inside of the backpack and then your phone usb can be attached to it from the outside through the small side port provided. There is an optional hole up top for headphones as well so you dont have to keep anything on the outside of the backpack. Safer storage. The straps are comfortable and secure for carry.
customer_reviews.author: peggi williams

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’2” and got the larger size and it’s a bit TOO large for me. But I’m still keeping it since it really fits a lot of things when necessary. I now use it as a dance and traveling bag because I can shove things into it quickly and not worry about it being drenched after walking in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cabe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Back Pack
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to carry school books. It looks smaller than it is and carries a fair amount of books. It also has storage compartments that are very useful. I really like that it is water resistant. I haven't had the opportunity to test just how resistant yet, but I will in the during the next couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jarhead 1103

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, sturdy backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to wear at my local Pride parade, and so far I really l like it. I've only worn it a few times since then but it looks nice and holds up really well. It's got a lot of neat features/compartments and holds quite a lot of stuff. I'll be using it on my hikes while I'm on vacation, and I'll try to update afterward with how it does.
customer_reviews.author: Taillow Marill

customer_reviews.title: great material
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a durable and strong backpack. My daughter has chosen poorly for the last two purchases for school and I was really happy when we got this and said that she had done well in her pick! And that was online. The other two were at a store we shopped at. I hope this lasts as long as it should, it seems like it will be a super one!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hadfield

customer_reviews.title: Good quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the USB charging port so I cant report on that, but the quality of the backpack is good. I'm not sure if the two side pockets would exactly fit a water bottle or umbrella, but they're nice if you wanted to put small items in there like keys. So far, I like the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as it looks in pictures!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is NOT AT ALLas big as it looks in the pictures. You can not fit half the stuff as shown in pics. Very disappointed considering it’s kind of pricey for the 17” one. Not happy to at all!
customer_reviews.author: kristy giammona

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight bag for Commuting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack for my son to use for his commute to his first job via train. He loves all the features especially the USB charging port. The bag is lightweight and not huge but plenty roomy for his needs. Fantastic product. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Katydid

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money- DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is horrible! Simply a waste of money. After using it for the first week, it ripped. Also it’s not water resistant. It rained and all my books got wet. This backpack only looks nice but it’s horrible. The charging feature broke also. The usb chord fell out and I can’t squeeze my fingers in to put it back. To sum up, this has been the worse backpack I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this backpack. My husband and I both used it while we were on vacation. I took my laptop and school books on the plane with ease. I took it on our road trip to Disneyland and even used it while at Disneyland.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a backpack that I can take to hospital during medical residency. I love this bag as I can not only take it to work but also to the city for a day out and even for hiking. It is pretty spacious for keeping most of thing I want to take with me. The only slight issue is I am not able to keep the bag upright at times and it tends to fall sideways. But since I need the backpack I can’t go through the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Zghaffar

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack in July 2018 for my son that is in middle school and the strap already broke off. The plastic part where you can adjust the strap broke in half. This is the first time any backpack my son had has broken like that. It was the first time buying this brand and it is not one that I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mariann

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple, basic pack to put my 17" work laptop in, couldn't find one big enough locally, seems they max out at 15". I didnt want a million straps and pockets everywhere, just enough room for the laptop and lunch. This fit the bill, I'm very happy with it It seems well made too.
customer_reviews.author: mossmouse

customer_reviews.title: Great for personal item on the plane!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for traveling out of state to use as my personal item bag on the plane. Worked great and exactly what I needed size wise and held up great on many flights. Fit right under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bilder

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this bag for about a week but I can already tell that I won't have any complaints down the line. Super nice look and super light weight even though I have a decent amount in it, including my laptop. The only thing that I am not used to is the front compartment being smaller. I usually get bookbags with a bigger front pocket and with more places for storage. However, I would still recommend this bag. I have also seen a few people on campus with Vancropak bags! P.S. you need an external charger to charge anything through the bag but I plug it into my laptop and it works just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the overall look of the backpack, the grey with the metallic zipper. But upon trying to use the charger port after plugging it in to the wall for a good while, it still didn’t work. The strap end was not large enough to keep the strap from going into the slot and keeping it from coming undone so I had to use some heavy duty duct tape to keep it from coming undone, not an ideal customization for a new backpack. I would’ve returned it but I needed a backpack for school and didn’t feel like messing with the post office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack
customer_reviews.text: I love this back pack and it's absolutely perfect for everything I need to use it on I even love the cellphone charging outlet it's alsome I Never had a back pack with that men it comes in handy I definitely recommend this back pack to everyone out there.
customer_reviews.author: jose f.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for graduate school! I typically pack about 6 books, 1 3-ring binder, a chrome book, snacks, water bottle, and a pouch of stationary stuff. It's sturdy and stylish. I thought it came with a battery pack, IT DOES NOT. Buy it separatedly for about $20 then the feature works great. Overall, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Deondra Avery

customer_reviews.title: Now I want 1 for myself.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my daughter to use for middle school. Needed something durable & tough that would withstand some abuse & this bag looks like it just might. It has great storage & zip pockets for all her school needs. I love it very much. Reading others reviews def helped me with my purchase decision. I’ll do an update after 2 months into the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Viva B.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a month
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag but ripped after a month of using it at school. I walk around often (college campus) and I consider myself careful with my bags. Has good storage but I found the bag to be too tall and not wide enough to fit everything I wanted. Shoulder straps were comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot smaller than I expected. The material is okay. Semi cheap feeling and looking. Unfortunately i will be returning this because the size is way too small. Looks like a childs backpack vs. an adult
customer_reviews.author: Yuyu

customer_reviews.title: Durable Teen-Approved Pack
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughters love these! I just bought two of the 17inch backpacks and there is ample room for their high school and junior high books and binders. They seem durable and I love that they aren’t from a local store or plastered with obnoxious brand names. These packs have a funky classic look.
customer_reviews.author: Toddlers and Teens

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Perfect color! Just the right amount of storage and pockets and fits my laptop perfectly and safely! I highly recommend it if you are looking for a good travel bag. I also use it everyday for work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Usb does not work & zipper got stuck the first week. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, size, and comfort, but falling apart slightly
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is adorable and I'm so glad to have it. I use the bag every day for work, and even after hours of walking with it on, it feels very comfortable. I've tested it in heavy rain, and it is resistant but definitely not water proof. That's not as much of a concern to me, though, as the fact that black handle on the top has already started to fray a little. It's still usable but I don't trust the handle when I pick up the bag. Still worth the money to me, though!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I went back to college and had a lot of books that I was tired of lugging around. I love how durable this back pack feels! The material is nice and thick and the pockets are nice and big.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Q

customer_reviews.title: Had it in the box still for over a month ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it in the box still for over a month and when I finally used it the zipper ripped through the stitching. Tried to get refund but it was past the refund period.
customer_reviews.author: jorge medina

customer_reviews.title: very durable backpak!
customer_reviews.text: Very good backpack. I bought it as a school backpack for my 7 years old son and after 1.5 year of usage it is still in like new conditions. i always trusted amazon star reviews and it never dissapointed me.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is falsely advertised as fitting a 15. ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is falsely advertised as fitting a 15.6" laptop; however, that is not the case. At least it doesn't fit in the designated laptop pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: The size was ok, but it was cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: The top handle was torn in one week. I didn't even hang my backpack with that. I carried a 13.5-inch laptop, 16 oz water bottle, and cosmetic bags. That part should last longer than one week. So I am getting another backpack from another vendor at Amazon. It was a good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack but battery is not included
customer_reviews.text: Just understand that you provide the battery. This only provides the cable that connects to the battery to your phone or device. The backpack itself is good quality and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for light weight
customer_reviews.text: Put 3 or 4 books in bag, not durable. It would be durable for lightweight. If you want heavy duty, search elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my nephew, a young man (18). Perfect for a laptop, cell, a small change of clothes (sports' clothes). Really water resistant/repellent. He was very glad with the hidden usb entrance and the opportunity of charging on the go. I also bought a portable charger and inserted into the inside pocket. It was a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Blauvelt

customer_reviews.title: USB port
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this backpack, I didn’t know it had a portable usb charger and was confused why there was a USB wire hanging in the back pack, but once I took a closer look I thought it was super cool! It has a sleeve for your laptop and a few smaller sleeves for pens. It’s a little difficult to get a water bottle in the side pockets on the outside but with patience it fits nicely. The color is perfect! I’m thinking of purchasing another in the cyan color!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Bembeneck

customer_reviews.title: like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack to travel with on an airplane and it worked great, I could fit a lot of things in it and it kept my laptop safe and didn't hurt my back or shoulders to carry around. I only knocked a star off because I can't seem to get the USB charger to work.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Sholly

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful price point. Well made and thoughtfully designed. Color is pleasant and interior great for organizing your items. Nice padded and adjustable shoulder straps.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping!! I bought this for school and it looks like it will hold up pretty well. The bag has a lot of space in the front pocket and in a bigger pocket. The quality is good, exactly what I bought. There's nothing I could say bad about this backpack. 5 stars from me <3
customer_reviews.author: Koneko

customer_reviews.title: Good price, sturdy but not as spacious as I would have preferred.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very sturdy backpack, but isn’t as spacious as I would like. I use it for my college classes on campus, and I don’t feel it’s quite big enough for the books I have. (A 3in 3-ring binder, lab book, a couple notebooks.) In my opinion, it could only fit three or four books depending on their size.
customer_reviews.author: hwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack!
customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack everyday. It’s great for my laptop. Holding my books. In the rain, nothing on the inside ever gets wet. It’s very sturdy. Once I realized I had to buy a portable charger, I was sold. Great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Edwards

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: it works. I wish it had its own little pocket for the cord on the inside so it can be out of the way. Other than that, love the bag. Side pockets.
customer_reviews.author: jessicabearre

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly the size of bag i was looking for. be mindful of the size for each bag, i would not recommend this bag for a student that carries a lot of text books. I use it instead of a tote bag for work, so its just the right size for my lunch box, wallet, and an extra sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Senechal

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: This is of low quality. One of the zippers came off immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mushky

customer_reviews.title: Needs a strap in the back for luggage .
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great back pack but it needs a strap on the back to slide on a carry on luggage . Having your electronics in it and carrying it through the airport I know they are safe but also heavy so the strap in the back would be nice . May return to find one with a strap .
customer_reviews.author: Debrahlynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome retro looking bag. Fits a 17 inch gaming laptop easily and more. Only issue the water bottle holder may be a bit tight had to purchase smaller diameter water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Paranoid Android

customer_reviews.title: cant figure out what to buy for the inside of ...
customer_reviews.text: cant figure out what to buy for the inside of the bag to get my kiddos to charge there phone, ended up having to buy a whole phone charger to put in bag
customer_reviews.author: HD nations

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! There is so much room for many things. Took it with me on a small trip and it fit everything I need. I use this for work to transport my files and laptop, everything fits great without being bulky! The hook up for an external charger is great. Hooked it right up and never had an issue! The straps are comfortable. Overall this is a great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very good backpack, decent size and made very well. My daughter is in college and has had her since she was a Junior in high school. No tears or rips
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle pocket is too small.. decent back ...
customer_reviews.text: Water bottle pocket is too small.. decent back pack not really ideal for traveling though decent for student with few books maybe a middle schooler definitely not for a college kid. Can’t even keep your water bottle walking across campus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year in and holding strong
customer_reviews.text: For a budget bag, after a year of regular use, this has done well. Only complaints are that the 'pen' pockets are poorly sized and not very rigid.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Smith

customer_reviews.title: the quality is superb
customer_reviews.text: This bag could sell for a hundred dollars! Its incredibly sturdy and has multiple compartments, including one for laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Prairierose

customer_reviews.title: +++++AWESOME BACKPACK+++++++
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this backpack for our kids for traveling. It's perfect size for what the airlines allow you on the plane, and love that there's a hole in the top of the backpack for earbuds. The quality and color is 5 stars. I bought one in each color. Not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Laurie R.
